title: Drakomire
summaries: The Drakomire is a Hardmode, post-Lunatic Cultist ground-based enemy that spawns in Solar Pillar area during the Lunar Events. Drakanians will occasionally spawn riding a Drakomire, resulting in a Drakomire Rider. When the player is in a distance of approximately 100 blocks away, they will shoot 3 Solar Flares, possibly to stop players from entering the area where the Solar enemies spawn.

statistics.Damage: 55/110/165
statistics.Max Life: 800/1600/2400
statistics.KB Resist: 80%/82%/84%
statistics.Banner: [img:Drakomire Banner]Drakomire Banner
